page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: The car is a useful means of transport in the countryside. Most people think bus fares are to much.Mrs. White said buses should be Â£1.00 return. Mini buses would be better.It would be preferable if steps were lower for old people etc. People say that buses should be more frequent.One trip to Cambridge from Toft takes 24 mins. It is said that buses should travel half hourly. Most interviewees like double deckers. A traffic survey showed that in one hour there were 151 vehicles coming to Toft from 4-5 pm and going towards Cambridge 105 Between 8-9 PM vehicles travelling towards Toft was 126 and travelling away was 143.
